content: I'll definitely consult with my vet before getting a new flea medication for Max. By the way, speaking of my vet, I need to remind my friend Sarah to return the dog crate I lent her a few weeks ago. I might need it for Max when we go on our upcoming road trip. Anyway, back to Luna - I've been thinking of getting her some new toys to keep her occupied. Do you have any recommendations for interactive cat toys or puzzle toys that can challenge her mentally?
